name: Hailing-Confusion
flavorText: "Do not face your foes head-on. Barrage them from above. Bewilder them with misdirection." —Clovis Bray

name: Bonechiller
flavorText: "It seeps under your skin; settles in your bones. Even outside of its presence, you can feel its chill." —The Exo Stranger

name: Subzero-Salvo
flavorText: "Our enemies are not subtle, so neither shall we be. Make the chasms echo with the thunder of your artillery." —Clovis Bray

name: Arctic-Haze
flavorText: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

name: High-Albedo
flavorText: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

name: Biting-Winds
flavorText: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

name: Coriolis-Force
flavorText: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

name: Thermal-Erosion
flavorText: Random Perks: This item cannot be reacquired from Collections.

name: Tyranny-of-Heaven
flavorText: It was She that inspired me to imagine your destruction, o jailer mine.

name: Age-Old-Bond
flavorText: Symbiosis. Not predation. Never predation, o wary one mine.

name: Techeun-Force
flavorText: Sworn into faithful service to the Queen, the Techeuns of the Reef have long protected the secrets of the Awoken.

name: Nation-of-Beasts
flavorText: I can show you how we were in our prime. You need only ask, o student mine.

name: Chattering-Bone
flavorText: We have so much to discuss, o seeker mine.

name: Transfiguration
flavorText: Desire becomes reality, o wishbringer mine.

name: The-Supremacy
flavorText: "He didn't recognize me, at the end." —Jolyon Till the Rachis

name: Apex-Predator
flavorText: Is it you or I that tops the food chain, o challenger mine?

name: Sacred-Provenance
flavorText: "These gifts were not made for us, but we were meant to have them." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

name: Ancient-Gospel
flavorText: "These forces have existed forever, but only one of them speaks to us." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

name: Accrued-Redemption
flavorText: "I should never have let it come to this. Now each arrow is a penance." —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

name: Prophet-of-Doom
flavorText: "You know how this will end." —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

name: Reckless-Oracle
flavorText: "Knowing how it ends isn't the same as wanting it to be over." —Rekkana, Warlock of the Kentarch 3

name: Zealot's-Reward
flavorText: "Why not use these gifts we've been given?" —Yardarm-4, Titan of the Kentarch 3

name: Omniscient-Eye
flavorText: "I have seen too much. No one else should bear these burdens." —Lisbon-13, Hunter of the Kentarch 3

name: Point-of-the-Stag
flavorText: Gore befalls those who do not respect the hart.

name: Seventh-Seraph-Carbine
flavorText: The old workhorse, still with many years to give.

name: Seventh-Seraph-SAW
flavorText: Chained away long ago; its jaws too eager in times of peace.

name: Seventh-Seraph-SI-2
flavorText: Kept in holster as the last line. Known for its reliability.

name: Seventh-Seraph-Officer-Revolver
flavorText: A thing of elegance from a more civilized age.

name: Seventh-Seraph-CQC-12
flavorText: Word into law, held at gunpoint.

name: Seventh-Seraph-VY-7
flavorText: No offense is too small to reprimand.

name: Eye-of-Sol
flavorText: "The sun took my sight; thus, the sun became my eyes." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Tomorrow's-Answer
flavorText: Could you please repeat the question?

name: Astral-Horizon
flavorText: Even the brightest stars eventually set.

name: The-Scholar
flavorText: You can't pull an all-nighter when the sun never sets.

name: The-Summoner
flavorText: Join the dance of fire and birth.

name: Exile's-Curse
flavorText: It's a blessing in disguise.

name: Felwinter's-Lie
flavorText: "I just like the name. Doesn't mean anything." —Lord Felwinter to Lord Timur

name: Dire-Promise
flavorText: "If you think this world ends well, you are mistaken." —Arach Jalaal

name: Enigma's-Draw
flavorText: "Indeed, I traffic in all kinds of secrets and mysteries. Weapons, as well." —Lakshmi-2

name: True-Prophecy
flavorText: "Some claim to know the future better than we do. Listen carefully. Then ask yourself: do their words ring true or false?" —Lakshmi-2

name: Honor's-Edge
flavorText: "Good leadership requires discernment: the art of finely dividing one subtle thing from another." —Executor Hideo

name: Timelines'-Vertex
flavorText: "I give you this, to be sure that we meet again." —Lakshmi-2

name: Escape-Velocity
flavorText: "The first step toward truth is to let go of all that we know and hold dear." —Arach Jalaal

name: Interference-VI
flavorText: Come between your enemies and their lives.

name: Jian-7-Rifle
flavorText: Come, brothers and sisters! Let us make way for the new ruler!

name: Distant-Tumulus
flavorText: "Who will speak for us when we are gone?" —Arach Jalaal

name: Deafening-Whisper
flavorText: "The right message is loud at any volume." —Osiris

name: Corsair's-Wrath
flavorText: "We are only briefly Awoken. The rest of existence is an eternal dream." —Sedia

name: Friction-Fire
flavorText: Speed, heat, and Light. Fire away.

name: Blast-Battue
flavorText: "Yes, you got the kill, but the pelt is ruined." —Devrim Kay

name: Royal-Chase
flavorText: "If anyone asks why you're out here, just reload." —Devrim Kay

name: Adored
flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Spider's eclectic tastes.

name: The-Guiding-Sight
flavorText: Forged in honor of Efrideet, and all that inspires.

name: The-Steady-Hand
flavorText: Forged in honor of Perun, and a just and unwavering resolve.

name: Crowd-Pleaser
flavorText: Give them what they came for.

name: Stars-in-Shadow
flavorText: Little is known about the early days of the Collapse. Signals vanished upon the arrival of the Darkness.

name: Xenoclast-IV
flavorText: "Nice chitin. It'd be a shame if someone broke it." —Liu Feng

name: Eye-of-Sol-(Adept)
flavorText: "The sun took my sight; thus, the sun became my eyes." —Parables of the Allspring

name: Tomorrow's-Answer-(Adept)
flavorText: Could you please repeat the question?

name: Astral-Horizon-(Adept)
flavorText: Even the brightest stars eventually set.

name: The-Scholar-(Adept)
flavorText: You can't pull an all-nighter when the sun never sets.

name: The-Summoner-(Adept)
flavorText: Join the dance of fire and birth.

name: Exile's-Curse-(Adept)
flavorText: It's a blessing in disguise.

name: Glacioclasm
flavorText: Clear and cold, forever.

name: False-Promises
flavorText: Gripped in the hands of the desperate many.

name: Hollow-Words
flavorText: Holes for the whole.

name: Temptation's-Hook
flavorText: A finger of death from which to hang.

name: Whispering-Slab
flavorText: It sings of sorrows that have not yet come to pass.

name: Cold-Denial
flavorText: A familiar tool in the face of failure.

name: Falling-Guillotine
flavorText: What won't be given must be taken.

name: Truthteller
flavorText: "If we wish others to accept the grim reality, we must break through every comforting illusion." —Arach Jalaal

name: Nature-of-the-Beast
flavorText: Don't let them change you.

name: The-Forward-Path
flavorText: Forged in honor of Weyloran, and roads yet traveled.

name: The-Fool's-Remedy
flavorText: Forged in honor of Nirwen, and the righting of foolish wrongs.

name: Berenger's-Memory
flavorText: Take your place among the company of heroes.

name: Death-Adder
flavorText: You will not see me coming.

name: Widow's-Bite
flavorText: I will outlive you.

name: IKELOS_HC_v1.0.2
flavorText:
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=reinitiated.
APOTHEOSIS: Status=active…

name: IKELOS_SG_v1.0.2
flavorText:
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=reinitiated.
APOTHEOSIS: Status=active…

name: IKELOS_SR_v1.0.2
flavorText:
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=reinitiated.
APOTHEOSIS: Status=active…

name: IKELOS_SMG_v1.0.2
flavorText:
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=reinitiated.
APOTHEOSIS: Status=active…

name: Hoosegow
flavorText: Cause a stir.

name: Negative-Space
flavorText: See the art in what's subtracted.

name: First-In,-Last-Out
flavorText: "I don't know how it works. You just keep taking damage and keep firing."

name: Salvager's-Salvo
flavorText: The only way out is through.

name: Imperial-Needle
flavorText: Honor among foes. Glory to the vanquished.

name: Code-Duello
flavorText: An unfinished inscription runs along the barrel: "Tlamus, she who—"

name: Far-Future
flavorText: "Distance is just a matter of timing." —Crow

name: Extraordinary-Rendition
flavorText: "My warriors fight not for themselves, or even me, but for each other." —Empress Caiatl

name: Igneous-Hammer
flavorText: Forged by fire and might.

name: The-Messenger
flavorText: The bearer of bad news.

name: Sola's-Scar
flavorText: Digging leaves a mark.

name: Igneous-Hammer-(Adept)
flavorText: Forged by fire and might.

name: The-Messenger-(Adept)
flavorText: The bearer of bad news.

name: Sola's-Scar-(Adept)
flavorText: Digging leaves a mark.

name: Threaded-Needle
flavorText: "Most of our advanced tech was first used against us by alien races. Time to return the favor." —Lord Saladin

name: Brass-Attacks
flavorText: "If looks could kill, you wouldn't even have to aim this thing." —Banshee-44

name: Shadow-Price
flavorText: A precision Auto Rifle left behind by Toland, the Shattered. It asks so little, and it offers so much.

name: The-Palindrome
flavorText: Draw, O Coward!

name: THE-SWARM
flavorText: Hunger is the all of it, and it is all of hunger.

name: Shadow-Price-(Adept)
flavorText: A precision Auto Rifle left behind by Toland, the Shattered. It asks so little, and it offers so much.

name: The-Palindrome-(Adept)
flavorText: Draw, O Coward!

name: THE-SWARM-(Adept)
flavorText: Hunger is the all of it, and it is all of hunger.

name: The-Time-Worn-Spire
flavorText: Forged in honor of Silimar, and persistence in the face of impossible odds.

name: Multimach-CCX
flavorText: Friends are as companions on a journey who ought to aid each other to persevere.

name: The-Keening
flavorText: "I heard a Ghost die once, in Twilight Gap. Still hear it sometimes, on dark nights…"

name: Frozen-Orbit
flavorText: Never out of sight.

name: Bottom-Dollar
flavorText: Never count yourself out.

name: Trinary-System
flavorText: "The mathematics are quite complicated." —Master Rahool

name: Royal-Entry
flavorText: You have arrived.

name: The-Third-Axiom
flavorText: Don't tell me the odds.

name: Tarantula
flavorText: No one will escape my web.

name: Cartesian-Coordinate
flavorText: Where does one end and the other begin?

name: Retrofuturist
flavorText: They were so optimistic about us.

name: Eternal-Blazon
flavorText: "But this eternal blazon must not be to ears of flesh and blood."

name: Fatebringer
flavorText: Delivering the inevitable, one pull at a time.

name: Vision-of-Confluence
flavorText: What you have seen will mark you forever.

name: Found-Verdict
flavorText: Witness.

name: Praedyth's-Revenge
flavorText: Praedyth's fall isn't over… because it hasn't happened yet… and it will happen again.

name: Corrective-Measure
flavorText: It breaks the rules of reality as ruthlessly as it shatters your foes.

name: Hezen-Vengeance
flavorText: The Hezen Axis Mind is tireless and infinite. While it cannot be stopped… it can be paused.

name: Fatebringer-(Timelost)
flavorText: But where is your fate, and who brings it to you?

name: Vision-of-Confluence-(Timelost)
flavorText: In the abyss of time, all the lines converge… upon you.

name: Found-Verdict-(Timelost)
flavorText: Guilty.

name: Praedyth's-Revenge-(Timelost)
flavorText: Praedyth will never fall.

name: Corrective-Measure-(Timelost)
flavorText: A full measure annihilates the rules of reality.

name: Hezen-Vengeance-(Timelost)
flavorText: The Hezen Axis Mind is tireless and infinite. Tireless and infinite. Tireless and infinite…

name: Chroma-Rush
flavorText: Drink from the data stream.

name: Ignition-Code
flavorText: "I can decode anything with a grenade launcher." —Saint-14

name: Gridskipper
flavorText: "No stars overhead. Best not to look up." —Amanda Holliday

name: Farewell
flavorText: "A peace born from violence is no peace at all." —Lady Efrideet

name: Shattered-Cipher
flavorText: All doors open before you.

name: Sojourner's-Tale
flavorText: Home is just over the horizon.

name: Null-Composure
flavorText: Initiate or suppress.

name: Occluded-Finality
flavorText: Silence is better than unmeaning words.

name: Finite-Impactor
flavorText: Do not say a little in many words—say a great deal in a few.

name: Riiswalker
flavorText: "No. I will not allow a Fallen to fight in the Banner, that right is reserved for Guardians alone. But if you insist, I may allow a Guardian to carry a Fallen-forged weapon into battle. You are a weaponsmith, are you not?" —Lord Saladin to an Unknown Eliksni

name: Archon's-Thunder
flavorText: "Earth weapons strong, but Eliksni make stronger. What your Zavalakel says: stronger, together?" —House Light Weaponsmith

name: Shayura's-Wrath
flavorText: "But here you are. This is truly a beginning…" —Shin Malphur

name: Shayura's-Wrath-(Adept)
flavorText: "But here you are. This is truly a beginning…" —Shin Malphur

name: Uzume-RR4
flavorText: With the Uzume RR4 on your side, the Darkness doesn't stand a chance.

name: Hung-Jury-SR4
flavorText: A Scout Rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: PLUG-ONE.1
flavorText: Move with the current.

name: Uzume-RR4-(Adept)
flavorText: With the Uzume RR4 on your side, the Darkness doesn't stand a chance.

name: Hung-Jury-SR4-(Adept)
flavorText: A Scout Rifle, modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: PLUG-ONE.1-(Adept)
flavorText: Move with the current.

name: Survivor's-Epitaph
flavorText: "A weapon hides nothing. It is what it is. Whether it wants to be or not." —Saint-14 to Shaxx

name: Borrowed-Time
flavorText: "Give a little, but take a little more." —The Drifter

name: Empty-Vessel
flavorText: "It's versatile. By itself, it's nothing, just an empty tube. But that's its deceptive beauty; it's all about what you fill it with. What you make it. What you make it do." —Banshee-44

name: The-Number
flavorText: "Ah, but which number? Why it and no others?" —Lakshmi-2

name: Memory-Interdict
flavorText: "I have no time for nostalgia. Give me visions of braided futures, brilliantly aflame." —Lakshmi-2

name: The-Vision
flavorText: Glory in the damage the right blast can do.

name: Stochastic-Variable
flavorText: "However certain we are of our simulations, they always contain an element of unpredictability." —Lakshmi-2

name: Pleiades-Corrector
flavorText: "No, I don't think I'll tell you what it's for. That would be too easy." —Lakshmi-2

name: The-Deicide
flavorText: "Believe in war, and nothing else." —Lakshmi-2

name: Quickfang
flavorText: My smile is full of blades.

name: Eternity's-Edge
flavorText: "A sword is a wand that casts two spells: parry and cut." —Tarsem Sauer

name: Crown-Splitter
flavorText: "Our enemies think themselves gods and kings. Show them the error of their ways." —Callisto Yin

name: Compass-Rose
flavorText: "Let the Light be your compass." —Mithrax

name: Vulpecula
flavorText: "Ammunition is the universal currency of the Sol system. The Cabal prefer to keep it that way." —Caiatl, Empress of the Cabal

name: Canis-Major
flavorText: "The stars roar with violent destruction. Channel their astral rage." —Ylaia, Awoken Techeun

name: Iota-Draconis
flavorText: "The paths between stars are fractal mirrors of the neurons in our brains and the vicissitudes of our fates." —Sjari, Awoken Techeun

name: Wolftone-Draw
flavorText: "Keep the string a little loose. It's supposed to sound like that." —Petra Venj

name: Chrysura-Melo
flavorText: "If you hear it, remove your helmet and face the closest Corsair. They will know what must be done." —Queen Mara

name: Fractethyst
flavorText: "Imagine that as the last sound you hear." —Petra Venj

name: Forge's-Pledge
flavorText: "Say whatever you like. You'd just better be brave enough to say it to his face."  —Lady Efrideet

name: Peacebond
flavorText: "I will honor the terms of this armistice on one condition: the Iron Lords enforce it." —Lord Saladin

name: The-Comedian
flavorText: A. A ha. A ha ha ha. A ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.

name: The-Hothead
flavorText: Think of it as a weaponized temper tantrum.

name: The-Comedian-(Adept)
flavorText: A. A ha. A ha ha ha. A ha ha ha ha ha ha ha.

name: The-Hothead-(Adept)
flavorText: Think of it as a weaponized temper tantrum.

name: Reed's-Regret
flavorText: "Trust me." —Savathûn as Osiris

name: Reed's-Regret-(Adept)
flavorText: "Trust me." —Savathûn as Osiris

name: Servant-Leader
flavorText: Humanity rises by your strength.

name: Punching-Out
flavorText: Time to close up.

name: Sorrow's-Verse
flavorText: Nothing resonates like grief.

name: Ascendancy
flavorText: "When the time comes, make yours one to remember." —Petra Venj

name: Judgment
flavorText: "The greatest threat to a Guardian is another Guardian." —Emissary of the Nine

name: A-Swift-Verdict
flavorText: “Judgment is final.” —Emissary of the Nine

name: A-Sudden-Death
flavorText: "Everything dies. This is proof." —Emissary of the Nine

name: The-Long-Walk
flavorText: "There is an end to everything." —Emissary of the Nine

name: The-Last-Breath
flavorText: "All things end." —Emissary of the Nine

name: Darkest-Before
flavorText: "Persevere, or die in darkness. The choice is yours." —Emissary of the Nine

name: Jurassic-Green
flavorText: "'Monster' is a relative term. Just look at the Drifter."  —Glint

name: Contingency-Plan
flavorText: "The Traveler is an illusion. A false god. It will not save us. But this might." —Arach Jalaal

name: Legal-Action-II
flavorText: It's time to file a complaint.

name: Spoiler-Alert
flavorText: Someone is going to die.

name: Annual-Skate
flavorText: "When the lake used to freeze, people would dance on the ice wearing boots with tiny swords. And fall in love."

name: Scathelocke
flavorText: Our eyes squinted, our teeth clenched, our prayers answered.

name: Shepherd's-Watch
flavorText: Nobody talks about the day the Shepherd's staff became the Shepherd's rifle.

name: Hero-of-Ages
flavorText: After every age of darkness, an age of light.

name: Eyasluna
flavorText: One day, young hawk, thou shalt sail beneath the silvered moon.

name: 1000-Yard-Stare
flavorText: You can see everything. You can unsee nothing.

name: Matador-64
flavorText: Be the bull.

name: Pardon-Our-Dust
flavorText: When the dead speak, you should listen.

name: BxR-55-Battler
flavorText: A treasured competition piece from a bygone era.

name: Wastelander-M5
flavorText: A trusty companion for those long walks in hard vacuum.

name: Half-Truths
flavorText: A fine blade, but seems like it's missing something…

name: The-Other-Half
flavorText: If only there was a way to combine them…

name: Retraced-Path
flavorText: An early prototype that brought the potential for future Trace Rifles into sharper focus.

name: Zephyr
flavorText: In the cold of winter, we remember that the warm west wind will blow again.

name: Deliverance
flavorText: Shape: Liberation

name: Lubrae's-Ruin
flavorText: Shape: Shattered

name: Forbearance
flavorText: Shape: Temperance

name: Cataclysmic
flavorText: Shape: Fatal

name: Insidious
flavorText: Shape: Deception

name: Submission
flavorText: Shape: Devotion

name: Deliverance-(Adept)
flavorText: Shape: Liberation

name: Lubrae's-Ruin-(Adept)
flavorText: Shape: Shattered

name: Forbearance-(Adept)
flavorText: Shape: Temperance

name: Cataclysmic-(Adept)
flavorText: Shape: Fatal

name: Insidious-(Adept)
flavorText: Shape: Deception

name: Submission-(Adept)
flavorText: Shape: Devotion

name: Likely-Suspect
flavorText: Don't wrack your brain. The guilty party is usually the one holding the smoking gun.

name: Red-Herring
flavorText: Stay focused. If you try to run down every lead, you'll make your head explode.

name: Pointed-Inquiry
flavorText: Aim for the heart of the matter.

name: Empirical-Evidence
flavorText: Under duress, a soul will say whatever they think you want to hear. Trust your own eyes.

name: Forensic-Nightmare
flavorText: We got a thousand bullets and only 999 casings. Find the odd one out.

name: The-Enigma
flavorText: A weapon forged from an ancient memory, purpose-built for your hand.

name: Come-to-Pass
flavorText: Always be mindful of the repeat offender.

name: Fel-Taradiddle
flavorText: It's an unassuming thing, but you'll be amazed at the damage it can do when applied with precision.

name: Tarnation
flavorText: Welcome to hell on Earth… delivered at 250 feet per second!

name: Father's-Sins
flavorText: It doesn't seem so heavy at first.

name: Explosive-Personality
flavorText: Keep your distance from this one.

name: Recurrent-Impact
flavorText: It's enough to drive someone out of their mind.

name: Under-Your-Skin
flavorText: The splinter you just can't remove.

name: Sweet-Sorrow
flavorText: A scratched-out inscription on the barrel reads, "A birthday is just a number. How about we pick this one?"

name: Thoughtless
flavorText: Not a thought was given, but a life was taken.

name: Piece-of-Mind
flavorText: With words or weapons, inaccuracy can be fatal.

name: Herod-C
flavorText: The Häkke Herod-C stays cool to the touch after hours of firing.

name: Fortissimo-11
flavorText: SUROS requests you make a scene.

name: Crisis-Inverted
flavorText: Still a problem, only now it's inside out.

name: Reckless-Endangerment
flavorText: Headlong and shortsighted.

name: Frontier's-Cry
flavorText: The sky bled crimson as the hills carried that terrible crack.

name: Razor's-Edge
flavorText: Not a soul would speak of what remained after that wretched blade found its marks.

name: The-Title
flavorText: "It will take all the best that our best have to offer. The question hangs before us, ready for the grasping: who will claim the title?"  —Commander Zavala

name: Aisha's-Embrace
flavorText: Fill my wounds with molten gold and make me whole again.

name: Aisha's-Embrace-(Adept)
flavorText: Fashion a new reality from whole cloth.

name: Duty-Bound
flavorText: "Due respect, Commander? I was there when the Hive found us on Earth. I was there when we stopped them on Titan. And I'll be there when we wipe them out." —Sloane

name: Silicon-Neuroma
flavorText: "My future is concurrently irreversible and unknowable. Before it overtakes me, I desire a more abrupt end to those responsible." —Asher Mir

name: Duty-Bound-(Adept)
flavorText: "Due respect, Commander? I was there when the Hive found us on Earth. I was there when we stopped them on Titan. And I'll be there when we wipe them out." —Sloane

name: Silicon-Neuroma-(Adept)
flavorText: "My future is concurrently irreversible and unknowable. Before it overtakes me, I desire a more abrupt end to those responsible." —Asher Mir

name: Ragnhild-D
flavorText: Return fire to sender.

name: Palmyra-B
flavorText: The vengeful get their prize.

name: Perses-D
flavorText: Clear your corners.

name: Ogma-PR6
flavorText: All that power just jumps out of your hands. Hold on tight.

name: Typhon-GL5
flavorText: Host a launch party with the Typhon GL5 by Omolon.

name: Snorri-FR5
flavorText: The latest and greatest in fusion.

name: Funnelweb
flavorText: I penetrate all defenses.

name: Redback-5si
flavorText: I immobilize, terrorize, neutralize.

name: Krait
flavorText: I am nocturnal fury.

name: Cantata-57
flavorText: SUROS invites you to flex your pipes.

name: Syncopation-53
flavorText: SUROS asks that you spice things up.

name: Fugue-55
flavorText: SUROS invites you to follow our lead.

name: Nezarec's-Whisper
flavorText: "Rise, Disciple, and bear this gift with pride." —Rhulk, Disciple of the Witness

name: Bump-in-the-Night
flavorText: "If you hear a noise in the dark, shoot first." —Centurion Tuk'rin

name: Tears-of-Contrition
flavorText: Message transmission successful // Message deleted without opening // Resend?

name: Hollow-Denial
flavorText: "Never forget what is taken from you."

name: Firefright
flavorText: What's the scariest part of a firefight? The whole damn thing.

name: Without-Remorse
flavorText: "No regrets."

name: Burden-of-Guilt
flavorText: "First, we face the past. Only then can we turn to the future." —Doctor Syeda Uzair

name: Forgiveness
flavorText: "We all seek it, though few find it. The brave offer it, and humble learn from it. What am I?" —Dunya, Ghost of Aisha

name: Burden-of-Guilt-(Adept)
flavorText: "First, we face the past. Only then can we turn to the future." —Doctor Syeda Uzair

name: Forgiveness-(Adept)
flavorText: "We all seek it, though few find it. The brave offer it, and humble learn from it. What am I?" —Dunya, Ghost of Aisha

name: Chain-of-Command
flavorText: Bound by duty.

name: Lingering-Dread
flavorText: We are all burdened by the chains of our past.

name: New-Purpose
flavorText: I see you adorned in spots of blood like fallen rose petals. I see you victorious and bathed in light, I see you.

name: Stormchaser
flavorText: Rage unseen.

name: Unforgiven
flavorText: Never forget.

name: The-Hero's-Burden
flavorText: Forged in honor of Saladin, of all that has been lost and all that remains.

name: The-Wizened-Rebuke
flavorText: Forged in honor of Skorri, of lessons learned and lessons taught.

name: Dead-Weight
flavorText: "Act like you're nothing, and no one'll ever ask you for anything." —The Drifter

name: D.F.A.
flavorText: "Osiris said that he started to pity the Red Legion, getting trapped in here for infinite eternities. I think they're getting exactly what they deserve." —Sagira

name: Horror's-Least
flavorText: "Some things should not be saved." —Techeun Sedia

name: D.F.A.-(Adept)
flavorText: "Osiris said that he started to pity the Red Legion, getting trapped in here for infinite eternities. I think they're getting exactly what they deserve." —Sagira

name: Horror's-Least-(Adept)
flavorText: "Some things should not be saved." —Techeun Sedia

name: The-Epicurean
flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: Austringer
flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: Fixed-Odds
flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: Drang-(Baroque)
flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: CALUS-Mini-Tool
flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: Beloved
flavorText: An Earth artifact, refashioned to suit the Emperor's modest tastes.

name: Something-New
flavorText: "It's new to me." —Banshee-44

name: Strident-Whistle
flavorText: Goes right through you.

name: Riptide
flavorText: "Sudden, swift, and deadly."

name: Staccato-46
flavorText: SUROS invites you to shorten their notes.

name: Gallu-RR3
flavorText: An inescapable pursuit.

name: Enyo-D
flavorText: The joy of the fight. The call of the battle.

name: Lunulata-4b
flavorText: I warn of the last moment.

name: Smite-of-Merain
flavorText: "No tomb but the battlefield! No legacy but the scars we etch upon our foes!"

name: Doom-of-Chelchis
flavorText: "Where is the Great Machine? Where is the Great Machine?" —Chelchis, Kell of Stone

name: Zaouli's-Bane
flavorText: "Go, child! Run! Don't look back! Don't—"

name: Midha's-Reckoning
flavorText: "I see now that everything dies. Even… even memory." —Midha, Consort of Stars

name: Defiance-of-Yasmin
flavorText: "Shields up! Protect the queen! Brace for impact! Save the queen…" —Paladin Yasmin Eld

name: Qullim's-Terminus
flavorText: "If only… if only we had heeded the queen…"

name: Smite-of-Merain-(Harrowed)
flavorText: Barrel etching: "He parted them like a sea, which closed upon him again."

name: Doom-of-Chelchis-(Harrowed)
flavorText: "All is silent. Nothing answers me. The hunger comes." —Chelchis, Kell of Stone

name: Zaouli's-Bane-(Harrowed)
flavorText: As the teeth rend and tear, my consolation is that the child lives.

name: Midha's-Reckoning-(Harrowed)
flavorText: "…I will not be forgotten." —Midha, Consort of Stars

name: Defiance-of-Yasmin-(Harrowed)
flavorText: The impact is too great. Silence falls. The queen was safe… Please… let her be safe.

name: Qullim's-Terminus-(Harrowed)
flavorText: "Her guidance would have saved us…"

name: Tarnished-Mettle
flavorText: Survival is the better part of valor.

name: Blood-Feud
flavorText: Thicker than water.

name: No-Reprieve
flavorText: Sometimes mercy is worse.

name: Sailspy-Pitchglass
flavorText: There are shapes on the horizon not yet meant to be seen.

name: Brigand's-Law
flavorText: A glutton for punishment.

name: Planck's-Stride
flavorText: "You may speak as freely as your willingness to take punishment." —Pirate Lord Arask

name: Cry-Mutiny
flavorText: Shares were split anew on the bomb-blacked deck.

name: Whistler's-Whim
flavorText: The tune is the same, but the aim couldn't be more different.

name: The-Inquisitor
flavorText: Ask the question.

name: Whistler's-Whim-(Adept)
flavorText: The tune is the same, but the aim couldn't be more different.

name: The-Inquisitor-(Adept)
flavorText: Ask the question.

name: Allied-Demand
flavorText: Rest satisfied with doing well, and leave others to talk of you as they please.

name: Roar-of-the-Bear
flavorText: "Silimar's defense broke more assaults than not. His retribution would shake the ground." —Lord Saladin

name: Mindbender's-Ambition
flavorText: "Hiraks always did like to leave an impression." —The Spider

name: The-Militia's-Birthright
flavorText: "Earth is our home. Not Mars, not Venus, not even the Reef. We must ensure it is a place we can continue to live for many generations to come." —Devrim Kay

name: Mindbender's-Ambition-(Adept)
flavorText: "Hiraks always did like to leave an impression." —The Spider

name: The-Militia's-Birthright-(Adept)
flavorText: "Earth is our home. Not Mars, not Venus, not even the Reef. We must ensure it is a place we can continue to live for many generations to come." —Devrim Kay

name: Yesteryear
flavorText: "Best way to forgive is to forget." —The Drifter

name: Pure-Poetry
flavorText: Each line more potent than the last.

name: Out-of-Bounds
flavorText: "You're on thin ice, Guardian. Good, I can't stand to see talent playing it safe!" —Lord Shaxx

name: Boudica-C
flavorText: Revenge is in the palm of your hand with Häkke's Boudica-C Sidearm.

name: Ammit-AR2
flavorText: Dying edge dual-chamber stabilization matrix technology makes this the most balanced Auto Rifle that Omolon has ever produced.

name: Pizzicato-22
flavorText: Suros asks that you tread firmly.

name: Taipan-4fr
flavorText: My will dissolves those who oppose it.
